name: Pumpkin Pie-Oat Flour Muffins
author: Lauren Munos Wylie
summary: I wanted to make pumpkin muffins that were gluten free, healthy, delicious, and easy, so I included oat flour. Chocolate chips or walnuts are optional.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a 12-cup muffin tin or line with paper liners
Mix oat flour, brown sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, baking soda, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, and salt together in a large bowl using a fork
Combine pumpkin puree, eggs, honey, applesauce, and oil in a separate bowl
Add pumpkin mixture to flour mixture and stir using a spatula until well combined
Spoon batter into the prepared muffin tin, filling cups 3/4 full
Bake until a fork or toothpick inserted in a cupcake center comes out clean, 22 to 25 minutes
